summary: Have started a new business with Vasayo .Great company with unique disruptive products to help Wellness and  Health. Love to be surfing all kinds of waves for quite a while .Now started Stand up Paddle boarding as another fun outlet for energy. Very fun and really makes you exercise . Racing drag cars in California was great exciting timesLiving at the beach for most of my life.Had a great company like Mad Science and have everyone enjoy  the benefits of it .Specialties: Fun Birthday Parties that come right to you at home or parks or entertainment centers as well. Fantastic summer camps Great Science events for kids 4-12 years of age.I have recently finished 5 different computer classes, Yes ,I take them and learn quick. It was fun to learn ,yet ,so much more.For a surf dude I catch on well. I am taking 18 hours of classes this month alone. I need to be ahead of the curve or lip at all times. Thanks to those who have endorsed me .Just attended a Constant Contact Social Media workshop for Pinterest, Facebook ,Twitter , Linked- In and Google +.Excellent training day . worth anyone's time.Now looking to have more people join my company Mad Science.Also after having cancer 5 1/2 years ago I lost all of my taste abilities.Thanks to doterra essential oils  ,however ,I now have regained them .Thanks goodness for that. So now I also to tell people about my good fortune with the essential oils.
